entry.title: Combined summary - Payment Protocol: BIP 70, 71, 72 (Gavin Andresen)
entry.summary: Tam√°s Blummer, the founder and CEO of Bitsofproof, has proposed a solution for reviewing payment requests and receipts in the future. He suggests attaching the PaymentACK to the payment request after it has been accepted by the merchant. The payment request can be located through the URI and this would allow for easy access to review both the request and receipt if necessary. This proposal could provide more transparency and accountability in the payment process, benefiting both merchants and customers.
